resources.string: This is the sample for MAHAndroidUpdater, library for notifying users about updates on installed android applications. \nIf your app for some reason suddlnly has deleted from PlayStore, don\'t worry you can provide you new app to old users too.
Library has totally created by Kotlin language in Android Studio. Contains sample in both Kotlin and Java. 100% compatible with Java and Kotlin applications.
Open dialog to see localized dialog

* We need help to add new language localization support for libarary. If you have any hope to help us we were very happy and you can check following GitHub Issues URL contribute. If you have any question please ask to me on settarxan@gmail.com
